page.title: 18RELIGION
page.content: Out of 375 children interviewed the following data was recorded: 73 worshiped regularly: 139 occasionally & 163 were non attenders.The majority of attenders worshiped at their local churches,Rainworth Methodist chapel, St.Simons church,St.Judes & St.Georges Roman Catholic church.Rainworth Methodist chapel was built in 1914. Prior to being used as a chapel the building was a school.In 1968 the chapel was officially opened.The present vicar Rev.R.Tait & his congregation has about 78 members.In 1979 an electrical organ was installed replacing the original wooden one.In 1925 a Rainworth & district male voice choir was formed and the church was the assembly point.The churches surrondings include a Maypole,a bowling green & tennis courts.
